content: Hello, I need to fix my heating system, is this XYZ services?
Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. Before we proceed, may I have your name, please?
Oh actually, I think I dialed the wrong number. Sorry about that!
No problem at all. I'll mark this number as a wrong number for our services. If you need us in the future, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
